title: Welcome to CIDgravity!
subtitle: To start enjoying CIDgravity you need to follow these 4 steps:

step.joinSlackCommunity: 1. If it's not already done, join our <1>Slack</1>
step.deployTheConnector: 3. Deploy the <1>CIDgravity-X connector</1> on the miner
step.testConnectivity: 4. Test the end-to-end connectivity between your miner and CIDgravity
